scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.dev.js --progress --profile
scripts.build:dev:renderer: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:build && npm run prep:dist && npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.renderer.dev.js --progress --profile
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:prod && docker build -t angular2-webpack-start:latest .
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.prod.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:test: npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.test-build.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:test:renderer: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:build && npm run prep:dist && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.renderer.test-build.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:prod:renderer: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:build && npm run prep:dist && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.renderer.prod.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:prod: npm run clean:dist &&  npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.prod.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:test: npm run clean:dist &&  npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.test-build.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:dev: cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run clean:dist &&  npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.dev.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:local: cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run clean:dist &&  npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.local.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:stage: npm run clean:dist &&  npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.stage.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:prod:renderer: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:dist && npm run prep:dist && npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=0 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.renderer.prod.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:test:renderer: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:dist && npm run prep:dist && npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.renderer.test-build.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:stage: npm run clean:dist && npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.stage.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:stage:renderer: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:build && npm run prep:dist && npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.renderer.stage.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:stage:renderer: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:dist && npm run prep:dist && npm run clean:aot && cross-env BUILD_AOT=1 npm run webpack -- --config config/webpack.renderer.stage.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.ci:aot: cross-env BUILD_E2E=1 npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:jit: cross-env BUILD_E2E=1 npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:prod && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:nobuild: npm run lint && npm test && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:testall: cross-env BUILD_E2E=1 npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:prod && npm run e2e && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e
scripts.ci:travis: cross-env BUILD_E2E=1 npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e:travis
scripts.clean: npm cache clean --force && npm run rimraf -- node_modules doc coverage dist compiled dll
scripts.release: npm run clean:packages && npm run build:aot:prod:renderer  && npm run build:main:prod &&  cross-env AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=key_id  AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=access_key electron-builder build  -mwl --x64 --publish always
scripts.package: npm run clean:packages && npm run build:aot:prod:renderer  && npm run build:main:prod &&  electron-builder build  -mw --x64
scripts.package:linux: rimraf packages/linux/* && npm run build:aot:prod:renderer  && npm run build:main:prod &&  electron-builder  build  --linux --x64
scripts.package:mac: rimraf packages/mac/* && npm run build:aot:prod:renderer  && npm run build:main:prod &&  electron-builder build  --macos --x64
scripts.package:windows: rimraf packages/win/* && npm run build:aot:prod:renderer  && npm run build:main:prod && electron-builder build  --win --x64
scripts.start:electron: npm run clean:dev && npm run prep:dev && node ./config/electron-dev
